Ah, can you smell the fresh Drupal?

30 Nov 2006

Drupal 5.0 beta 2 is out now and God-damn , I... I got to tell you, I'm fairly excited to see what you're capable of, if Morpheus is right and all... I'm not supposed to talk about this, but if you are... a very exciting time. We got a lot to do. We got to get to it....
